ticketing_policies.title: No Refunds or Exchanges
ticketing_policies.description: All ticket sales are final. No refunds or exchanges will be issued except in the case of game cancellation without rescheduling.

ticketing_policies.title: Mobile Entry Only
ticketing_policies.description: Entry to FedExForum requires mobile tickets via the Grizzlies Mobile App or Ticketmaster account. Physical tickets are not accepted.

ticketing_policies.title: Child Admission Policy
ticketing_policies.description: Children under 2 years old may enter free if they sit on an adult's lap. All other children require a ticket.

ticketing_policies.title: Resale Restrictions
ticketing_policies.description: Tickets may only be resold through official Grizzlies partners (e.g., Ticketmaster). Third-party resales above face value are prohibited.

ticketing_policies.title: Game Time Changes
ticketing_policies.description: Ticket holders will be notified of any game time changes via email. Original tickets remain valid unless otherwise stated.
